root.name: Stacked with Daniel Negreanu
root.description: OverviewStacked with Daniel Negreanu is a poker related game that was released for the PC, PS2, Xbox and PSP. It was released in US in 2006 and in Europe and Australia in 2007. The game was developed by 3G Studios and 5000ft. It was published by Myelin Media across all platforms and in all regions.

similar_games.game: World Series of Poker: Tournament of Champions
